Class SecurityUtils

      • getFingerprint

        public static String getFingerprint(PublicKey key)
        Computes the fingerprint for a public key, in the standard SSH format, e.g. "4b:69:6c:72:6f:79:20:77:61:73:20:68:65:72:65:21"
        Parameters:
        key - the public key
        Returns:
        the fingerprint
        See Also:
        specification
